Docs.summary: The namespace contains types that support the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application Model and provide access to application information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application Model, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](../Topic/Overview%20of%20the%20Visual%20Basic%20Application%20Model.md).
